C

Represents a player character.

Constructs a player character.
ChatColor - Class in jmud
Holds a representation for ANSI color codes and provides methods for color formatting strings.
ChatColor() - Constructor for class jmud.ChatColor
 
CLEAR - Static variable in class jmud.ChatColor
 
ClientDescriptor - Class in jmud
Represents a client connection and handles socket IO for each connection.
ClientDescriptor(Socket) - Constructor for class jmud.ClientDescriptor
Creates a new client connection associated with the given Socket.
closeConnection(ClientDescriptor) - Static method in class jmud.Server
Closes the connection with the client associated with descriptor
colorFormat(String) - Static method in class jmud.ChatColor
Formats a message to replace the color tokens with ANSI color codes.
Command - Class in jmud
Represents a command entry, including its name, aliases, and minimum character level required to use the command.
Command(String) - Constructor for class jmud.Command
Constructs a command entry with the given name.
Command(String, int) - Constructor for class jmud.Command
Constructs a command entry with the given name and minimum level.
Command(String, int, boolean) - Constructor for class jmud.Command
Constructs a command entry with the given name, minimum level, and full-command-name requirement.
Command(String, int, String) - Constructor for class jmud.Command
Constructs a command entry with the given name, minimum level, and usage string.
Command(String, int, String[]) - Constructor for class jmud.Command
Constructs a command entry with the given name, minimum level and aliases.
command - Variable in class jmud.command.CommandTemplate
The command object that this template handles.
CommandHandler - Class in jmud
Handles command input from clients and dispatches each command.
CommandHandler() - Constructor for class jmud.CommandHandler
Constructs a command handler that represents all commands on the server.
Commands - Class in jmud.command
Represents a command to send the client all available commands.
Commands(Command) - Constructor for class jmud.command.Commands
Constructs a new command template for the "Commands" command.
CommandTemplate - Class in jmud.command
Abstract command class for implementing all commands.
CommandTemplate(Command) - Constructor for class jmud.command.CommandTemplate
Constructs a new command based on the template that is based off the command object given by "command".

CYAN - Static variable in class jmud.ChatColor
